message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm happy to start the conversation at $1,500,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I understand you're looking for a competitive price, Bob. However,  $800,000 is significantly below its true value.  To move forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This reflects the value and potential this product offers.
I understand the product's value, but I'm still not willing to go above $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1,200,000. Can you consider this compromise?
